descriptors.name: DHT11-Baremetal
descriptors.label: DHT11 Baremetal-ZG28
descriptors.description: This example demonstrates how to interface a DHT11 temperature and humidity sensor with a Silicon Labs EFR32ZG28 device using baremetal programming. The example includes code to read data from the DHT11 sensor and display the temperature and humidity values on a serial terminal. It is designed for simplicity and ease of understanding, making it suitable for beginners looking to learn about sensor interfacing and baremetal programming on Silicon Labs devices.
descriptors.author: Himanshu Fanibhare
